match.title: 1st Match
match.statusText: India won by 4 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

image.caption: Doug Cowie - Portrait, May 2002
image.longCaption: Portrait of Doug Cowie, New Zealand 'A' panel umpire in the 2002/03 season.

image.caption: Robin Singh - Portrait
image.longCaption: 10 Jan 2000: Robin Singh of India ahead of the Carlton and United One Day International between India and Pakistan at The Gabba, Brisbane, Australia.

image.caption: Robin Singh - Portrait
image.longCaption: 10 Jan 2000: Robin Singh of India ahead of the Carlton and United One Day International between India and Pakistan at The Gabba, Brisbane, Australia.

dismissalText.commentary: Robin Singh run out (Shahriar Hossain) 8 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 133.33

notes: Early morning fog delayed the match by 40 minutes. Match will be 48 overs a side.

milestones.description: Aminul Islam and Khaled Mahmud's 109-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 5th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 72 between Aminul Islam and Akram Khan
Hasibul Hossain has become the top wicket-taker for BAN in ODIs with 10 wickets, going past Minhajul Abedin's 9
This is the highest match aggregate (381) involving teams India & Bangladesh in ODIs
Akram Khan has broken the record for most catches (6) in ODIs for BAN, going past Aminul Islam's 5
Srinath has taken the most five-wicket hauls (3) in ODIs for IND, going past Srikkanth's record

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start
